snippet: Chrystalla Georghadji, who has been the country’s anticorruption watchdog since 1998, had been investigating the central bank governor.
abstract: Cyprus appoints anticorruption watchdog Chrystalla Georghadji to replace its central banker, Panicos O Demetriades, who resigned abruptly a day earlier in face of tensions with the government.
lead_paragraph: Chrystalla Georghadji, who has been the country’s anticorruption watchdog since 1998, had been investigating the central bank governor.

headline.main: Cyprus Names Its Top Auditor to Lead Central Bank
headline.print_headline: New Chief for Cyprus Central Bank
